title: Credit & Funding VA – Help Louisiana Resident Get Home + $50K in Funding
job_overview:
I’m looking to hire a Virtual Assistant from the Philippines who is highly experienced in credit funding for U.S. clients, specifically Louisiana residents.
I need help getting approved for a home loan and also securing $50,000+ in personal or business funding.

???? The VA I’m looking for must:
 • Know how to analyze credit reports (Experian, IdentityIQ, Credit Karma)
 • Understand 0-down home loan options like FHA, USDA, or DSCR (or connect me with someone who does)
 • Be able to:
 • Find lenders that offer $10K+ loan or credit card approvals
 • Stack approvals without hurting my score
 • Work with a 722 score, low inquiries, and 1 collection
 • Know which lenders:
 • Offer soft-pull prequalification
 • Are friendly to Louisiana residents
 • Can fund $40K–$60K or more, fast

?

???? Tools or Skills That Help:
 • Knowledge of Credit Repair Cloud, LetterStream, IdentityIQ
 • Experience with business credit, credit card stacking, and mortgage funding
 • Can create a custom funding plan
 • Fluent in English, highly responsive, and detail-oriented

?

???? Payment:
 • Starting pay: $5–$8/hour
 • Bonus for every approval or funding milestone reached
 • Full-time or part-time — I’m flexible but I need someone ready to work now
